sentences.pinyin: xiāo fáng yuán zhèng zài pū miè huǒ zāi
sentences.translation: The firefighter is putting out the fire.

sentences.simplifiedText: 由于消防员的及时到场，大火被有效的控制住，避免了更大的损失。
sentences.traditionalText: 由於消防員的及時到場，大火被有效的控制住，避免了更大的損失。
sentences.pinyin: yóu yú xiāo fáng yuán de jí shí dào chǎng,dà huǒ bèi yǒu xiào de kòng zhì zhù, bì miǎn le gèng dà de sǔn shī.
sentences.translation: Thanks to the timely arrival of the firefighters, the fire was effectively controlled, preventing greater losses.
